[img]http://s19.postimg.org/q8fnlww2b/1_cast.png[/img]



    Gugu Mbatha-Raw: Noni
    Minnie Driver: Macy Jean
    Nate Parker: Kaz
    Danny Glover: Cpt. Nicol
    Machine Gun Kelly: Kid Culprit
    Darryl Stephens: Quentin
    Elaine Tan: April
    Tyler Christopher: Liam
    Benito Martinez: Jesse Soria
    Aisha Hinds: J Stanley


   
[img]http://s19.postimg.org/okgi79i6r/1_trama.png[/img]. 

Le pressioni del successo stanno portando la cantante Noni sull'orlo del baratro, fino a quando non conosce Kaz, un giovane poliziotto che la aiuta e la incoraggia.........

[img]http://s19.postimg.org/fzn6g380j/1_story.png[/img]

The pressures of fame have superstar singer Noni on the edge, until she meets Kaz, a young cop who works to help her find the courage to develop her own voice and break free to become the artist she was meant to be.................
